name: Fiddlesticks
title: the Harbinger of Doom
lore:
For nearly twenty years, Fiddlesticks has stood alone in the easternmost summoning chamber of the Institute of War. Only the burning emerald light of his unearthly gaze pierces the musty darkness of his dust-covered home. It is here that the Harbinger of Doom keeps a silent vigil. His is a cautionary tale of power run amok, taught to all summoners within the League. Decades ago, there existed a powerful rune mage from Zaun - Istvaan. At the end of the fifth Rune War, he became one of the League's first summoners. Too much a prisoner to the old ways of magic, Istvaan stepped further and further outside the rules of conduct in the League. In what was ultimately his last match, his reach finally exceeded his grasp. Sealing himself inside the easternmost summoning chamber, he began incanting the most forbidden of rituals - an extra-planar summoning.

What exactly happened inside that chamber remains unknown. No champion came to represent Zaun that day in Summoner's Rift. Only silence echoed back from repeated knocks on the chamber door. The first apprentice who entered was cut down immediately by an unearthly scythe. What few who followed and survived were driven mad by fear, mere husks of men gibbering about crows and death. Afraid of the evil even Istvaan could not control, the League sealed all exits to the chamber, hoping they could contain what they could not destroy. Years went by, but the wooden figure within never moved save to slay any foolish enough to enter. Seeing no recourse to reclaim the chamber, the Council instead devised a use for Fiddlesticks: executioner. While he comes to life and seemingly abides by the rules of summoning in the Fields of Justice, what he awaits inside his chamber is unknown. His unmoving face yields no clues, and his scythe stands ready to strike down any who stand before him.

Those who say 'you have nothing to fear but fear itself' have not yet felt the crows.

spells.name: Terrify
spells.description: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
spells.tooltip: Terrifies a target, causing it to flee from Fiddlesticks for {{ e1 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Terrifies a target, causing it to flee from Fiddlesticks for {{ e1 }} seconds.

spells.name: Drain
spells.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
spells.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks creates a tether to the target unit and channels Drain on it, granting True Sight and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to the target. Fiddlesticks heals for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

Drain lasts up to {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing a total of {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fiddlesticks creates a tether to the target unit and channels Drain on it, granting True Sight and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to the target. Fiddlesticks heals for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt. Drain lasts up to {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing a total of {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.

spells.name: Dark Wind
spells.description: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
spells.sanitizedDescription: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
spells.tooltip:
Unleashes a Crow at the targeted enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage before bouncing to another target. Units struck are also silenced for {{ e2 }} seconds the first time per cast.

Dark Wind can strike up to {{ e3 }} times and will prioritize enemies being Drained or ones it has not yet hit. Deals {{ e4 }}% damage to minions and monsters.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Unleashes a Crow at the targeted enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage before bouncing to another target. Units struck are also silenced for {{ e2 }} seconds the first time per cast. Dark Wind can strike up to {{ e3 }} times and will prioritize enemies being Drained or ones it has not yet hit. Deals {{ e4 }}% damage to minions and monsters.

spells.name: Crowstorm
spells.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
spells.sanitizedDescription: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
spells.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks channels for {{ e3 }} seconds, then blinks to the target point unleashing a murder of crows that flock wildly around him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

The effect lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total magic damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Fiddlesticks channels for {{ e3 }} seconds, then blinks to the target point unleashing a murder of crows that flock wildly around him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to all enemy units in the area. The effect lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total magic damage.

passive.name: Dread
passive.description:
Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer.

Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer. Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.
